summary: An Ordinance appropriating money from the General Fund to the special fund for Local Improvement District No. 2601, for the improvement of Shilshole Avenue, from Fourteenth Avenue Northwest to Four Hundred Ninety-six and Eight One-hundredths (496.08) feet west of the intersection of Twenty-second Avenue Northwest and Shilshole Avenue, and certain other streets, under Ordinance No. 30389, as a loan; and providing for the repayment thereof to the General Fund from such special improvement fund, and declaring an emergency.
